类 Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Card>

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Card>, java.io.Serializable
    This class is used for representing a card in general card games.
    作者:
    Kenneth Wong
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Card(int suit, int rank)
      Creates and returns an instance of the Card class.

    • 方法概要

      Compares this card with the specified card for order.

      Indicates whether the specified card is "equal to" this one.
      int getRank()
      Returns the rank of a card.
      int getSuit()
      Returns the suit of a card.
      int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code value for the card.

      Returns a string representation of the card.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Card

        public Card(int suit,
            int rank)
        Creates and returns an instance of the Card class.
        参数:
        suit - an int value between 0 and 3 representing the suit of a card:

        0 = Diamond, 1 = Club, 2 = Heart, 3 = Spade

        rank - an int value between 0 and 12 representing the rank of a card:

        0 = 'A', 1 = '2', 2 = '3', ..., 8 = '9', 9 = '0', 10 = 'J', 11 = 'Q', 12 = 'K'

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSuit

        public int getSuit()
        Returns the suit of a card.
        返回:
        an int value between 0 and 3 representing the suit of a card:

        0 = Diamond, 1 = Club, 2 = Heart, 3 = Spade

      • getRank

        public int getRank()
        Returns the rank of a card.
        返回:
        an int value between 0 and 12 representing the rank of a card:

        0 = 'A', 1 = '2', 2 = '3', ..., 8 = '9', 9 = '0', 10 = 'J', 11 = 'Q', 12 = 'K'

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the card.
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        a string representation of the card

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Card card)
        Compares this card with the specified card for order.
        指定者:
        compareTo 在接口中 java.lang.Comparable<Card>
        参数:
        card - the card to be compared
        返回:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this card is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified card

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object card)
        Indicates whether the specified card is "equal to" this one.
        覆盖:
        equals 在类中 java.lang.Object
        参数:
        card - the reference object with which to compare
        返回:
        true if this card has the same rank and suit as the specified card; false otherwise

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Returns a hash code value for the card.
        覆盖:
        hashCode 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        a hash code value for the card
